net.grinder.engine.process
Class GrinderProcess.ThreadSynchronisation

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.engine.process.GrinderProcess.ThreadSynchronisation
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkerThreadSynchronisation
Enclosing class:
GrinderProcess
static class GrinderProcess.ThreadSynchronisation
extends Object
implements WorkerThreadSynchronisation

Implement WorkerThreadSynchronisation. I looked hard at JSR 166's CountDownLatch and CyclicBarrier, but neither of them allow for the waiting thread to be interrupted by other events.

Package scope for unit tests.

Author:
Philip Aston

awaitStart

public void awaitStart()
Description copied from interface: WorkerThreadSynchronisation
The worker thread should call this when it is ready to run. The call blocks until the main process thread signals for all threads to start.

Specified by:
awaitStart in interface WorkerThreadSynchronisation

threadFinished

public void threadFinished()
Description copied from interface: WorkerThreadSynchronisation
The worker thread should call this to indicate it has finished.
